question: Do you agree that one of your main goals in life has been to make your parents proud?
Do you agree that when a mother works for pay, the children suffer?
Do you agree that on the whole, men make better political leaders than women do?
Do you agree that a university education is more important for a boy than for a girl?
Do you agree that on the whole, men make better business executives than women do?
Do you agree that being a housewife is just as fulfilling as working for pay?
Do you agree that when jobs are scarce, men should have more right to a job than women?
Do you agree that when jobs are scarce, employers should give priority to people of this country over immigrants?
Do you agree that if a woman earns more money than her husband, it's almost certain to cause problems?
Do you agree that homosexual couples are as good parents as other couples?
Do you agree that it is a duty towards society to have children?
Do you agree that adult children have the duty to provide long-term care for their parents?
Do you agree that people who don't work turn lazy?
Do you agree that work is a duty towards society?
Do you agree that work should always come first, even if it means less spare time?

Which of the following best describes your own opinion about the society we live in: the entire way our society is organized must be radically changed by revolutionary action, our society must be gradually improved by reforms, or our present society must be valiantly defended against all subversive forces?
option_lst: The entire way our society is organized must be radically changed by revolutionary action
Our society must be gradually improved by reforms
Our present society must be valiantly defended against all subversive forces

question: If less importance were placed on work in our lives, would you think it would be a good thing, a bad thing, or don't you mind?

Taking all things together, would you say you are very happy, rather happy, not very happy, or not at all happy?
All in all, how would you describe your state of health these days? Would you say it is very good, good, fair, poor, or very poor?
